long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avitech - Smarter Email Writing Made Simple
Avitech is a Chrome extension that helps you rewrite emails on Gmail with ease. Just type your message, and Avitech will suggest a rewritten version using OpenAI’s powerful API. You can choose to send the rewritten email as is or make edits before sending. Perfect for crafting professional, clear, or friendly emails effortlessly!
